author: Joshua Jamerson
title: Democrat in Pennsylvania Race Declares Victory
text:
Democrat Conor Lamb claimed victory with a razor-thin lead in Pennsylvania’s special election for a U.S. House seat Wednesday morning, even as absentee ballots were being tallied, GOP candidate Rick Saccone refused to concede, and members of both parties tried to draw political lessons from the upset victory.
Despite the tight margin, Democrats were emboldened by their party’s show of strength in a district that President Donald Trump won in 2016 by 20 percentage points.
... RELATED VIDEO Can the Democrats Ride a Blue Wave to Midterm Election Wins? The Democrats have a "blue wave" of momentum building for the 2018 midterms, thanks to a motivated base, success in special elections and a low approval rating for President Trump. Will that be enough to take back the House and the Senate?
